name: The Theatre Club and Its Double
name_original: The Theatre Club and Its Double
description:
• Questions about self-worth, identity, and Dutch-process cocoa powder.
  • Cacti trivia.
  • More Shakespearean references than you ever hoped to see in a video game.
  • A total disregard for fire safety regulations.
  • 4 Endings One, true ending.
TW (spoiler-ish)
  • Violence
  • Suicide
  • Strong language
  • Self harm
  • Blood
